name: Zanki Zero: Last Beginning - Survival Soundtrack
detailed_description:
34-track soundtrack available as an early-purchase bonus through April 16, 6:00PM PDT.

Complete Track Listing:

01 - ZANKI ZERO
02 - SENSE OF WONDER
03 - ALARM ALERT
04 - ERROR CODE
